articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to be Commemorated in Russia 
     Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Russian preparatory committee was formed on Jan. 23 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and Feb. 16. Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected its chairman and Mikhail Tsitarenko, director of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, Oleg Shenin, chairman of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, and 8 other figures from all walks of life were chosen as its members. 
 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful functions including a meeting and a photo and book exhibition on those occasions.

Greetings to King of Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan 
    Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to King of Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan Abdullah II on the occasion of his 44th birthday. 
 The message sincerely wished him good health and happiness and greater success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.content:
Chairman of Asian Football Confederation Here 
    Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Asian Football Confederation Mohamed Hammam Saad Al-Abdulla and his party arrived here today.
 They were greeted at the airport by Minister of Foreign Trade Rim Kyong Man who is chairman of the DPRK Football Association, Vice-Chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Jong In Chol, and officials concerned.

articles.title: National Sketch Festival Soon to Be Held
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chairman of Asian Football Confederation
    Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Mohamed Hammam Saad Al-Abdulla , chairman of the Asian Football Confederation, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Minister of Foreign Trade Rim Kyong Man who is chairman of the DPRK Football Association, Vice-Chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Jong In Chol and officials concerned.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to be Marked in Britain
    Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The British preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, the birthday of leader  Kim Jong Il, was formed on Jan. 19.
 Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee and Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, vice-chairman of the preparatory committee.
 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful events including a meeting, a film show and a photo exhibition on the occasion.
